message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. I think this is a fair price considering its value, but I'm open to negotiations.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only afford to pay up to $850000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $900000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
